alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 1:39AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis and west central Lake Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 138 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Boulder Lake, or 24 miles north of Superior, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wolf Lake and Highland Lake around 155 AM CDT. Brimson and Thomas Lake Near Brimson around 200 AM CDT. Fairbanks around 205 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Pequaywan Lake, Wales and Bassett Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
